etymons.meaning: jeter quelqu'un çà et la, faire errer dans le monde

Preterit.turoyo: mṭawṭaḥleruḥe b-i=kow-áyo-walaltaḥ 793; b-aq=qayseqṭilole i=aṯtohayo-ste w-mḥalaqqe a=tremṭawṭḥənnebayn u=talg-awomḥalqənnelarwal
translations: ‘He (the husband, m.) killed his wife with a club, and they (husband and his acquaintance) threw the two bodies (of wife and her lover) outside, in the snow’
